item.title: Tornado outbreak live updates: 40 tornadoes, 34 dead in cross-country storm system
item.description: A severe weather outbreak has brought violent, long-track tornadoes to parts of the South, with damaging winds of up to 80 mph and large hail.

item.title: WATCH: Dog goes viral for cuddling
item.description: Justice the dog is a trained emotional support animal who went viral for cuddling after his owner posted a video on TikTok.
